topic.title: Basic Structure of the File Description (//fileDesc)

body.p: The bibliographic information on the DTA full text and the underlying source is summarized in the File Description (<fileDesc>).
body.codeblock: <fileDesc> <titleStmt>[title information on the DTA edition]</titleStmt> <editionStmt>[type of the DTA edition]</editionStmt> <extent>[specification of extent]</extent> <publicationStmt>[specifications of the DTA edition]</publicationStmt> <sourceDesc>[specifications on the original of the DTA full text]</sourceDesc> </fileDesc>
